caption:
The photograph captures two men seated inside an open, small electric vehicle, indicating a casual yet business-related interaction possibly during an event or expo. The vehicle is red with a black interior and features a prominent label that reads "SUNDANCER Electric."

The man in the driver's seat wears a blue pinstripe suit, pale blue shirt, and sunglasses, and appears to be engaged in a conversation. The other man, sitting in the passenger side, is dressed in a light brown jacket, beige trousers, and a patterned tie, and he seems to be either listening or speaking to the driver.

Both individuals wear badges, suggesting they are at a formal event, such as a trade show or corporate function. In the background, there is a glimpse of other attendees, one visibly in a tan suit.

The setting appears to be outdoors, possibly near a building or a park, as indicated by the greenery and the walking paths visible. The mood seems professional yet relaxed, likely centered around the vehicle or technology they are in.
title: Exhibit at the first symposium on low pollution power systems development held at the marriott motor inn, ann arbor vehicles and hardware were assembled at the epa ann arbor laboratory.  Part of the exhibit was held in the motel parking lot shown here is the interior of the esb "sundancer" electric car (developed for research purposes only)
